Seal characters (1)

犨字的基本解释

犨
chōu
牛喘息的声音。
突出：“南家之墙犨于前而不直”。

犨字的汉语字典释义

[①]［chōu］
［《廣韻》赤周切，平尤，昌。］
亦作“犫1”。
(1)牛息声。
(2)突出。《吕氏春秋·召类》：“南家之牆犨於前而不直。”高诱注：“犨，猶出。曲出子罕堂前也。”一说同“讎”，犹当，正对着。陈奇猷校释引洪颐煊曰：“犨，當爲讎。《漢書·灌夫傳》晉灼注：'讎，當也。'”

犨字的康熙字典解释

【巳集下】【牛字部】　犨； 康熙笔画：20； 页码：页705第10
【唐韻】赤周切【集韻】蚩周切，?音趎【說文】牛息聲。　又牛名。　又姓。【風俗通】晉大夫郤犨之後。　又【玉篇】出也。【呂氏春秋】南家之牆，犨於前而不直。　又縣名。【史記·高祖紀】與南陽守齮戰犨東。【前漢·地理志】南陽郡犨。【註】犨，昌牛反。　【廣韻】本作犫。

考證：〔【史記·高祖紀】南陽守齮戰犨東。〕　謹照原文南上增與字。

犨
Basic explanation of words
犨
chōu
The sound of cow panting.
Prominent: "The wall of the Nanjia is in front but not straight."
犨
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［chōu］
["Guangyun" Chi Zhouqie, Pingyou, Chang. ]
Also known as "犫1".
(1) The sound of a cow's breath.
(2) Outstanding. "Lu Shichunqiu·Zhao Lei": "The wall of the Nan family is not straight in front." Gao You's note: "Y, still out. The song is out in front of Zihantang." Facing. Chen Qiyou's proofreading quote Hong Yixuan said: "Y, treat it as 雠. "Han Shu Guan Fu Biography" Jin Zhuo's note:'Yu, dang Ye.'"
犨
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Si Ji 2] [Cow Character Department] 　犨; Kangxi Strokes: 20; Page Number: Page 705 No. 10
[Tang Yun] Chi Zhou cut [Ji Yun] Chi Zhou cut,? Yin Jian [Said Wen] The sound of cow breath.　Also name.　Another last name. [Customs and Customs] After Dr. Jin, but after.　[Jade articles] again. [Lu Shi Chun Qiu] The wall of the South House is not straight in front of you.　Also the county name. [Historical Records · Gao Zu Ji] Battle with Nanyang Shoujuan at Yidong. [Former Han Geography] Nanyang County Yi. [Note] 犨, Chang Niu opposes.　【Guangyun】This is a 犫. Textual research: [[Historical Records · Gaozu Ji] Nanyang Shoujuan battles Yidong. 〕 　 I would like to add the word to the south according to the original.
